title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 540.11 - Internal administrative safeguards over medical care expenditures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 540.11 - Internal administrative safeguards over medical care expenditures

State Regulations
(a) General. The
public welfare official shall establish internal practices that will safeguard
the proper expenditure of funds for medical care. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
540.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
